comments:
Steps:
1. Create a template, add a Text item "t1" or others
2. Create template item using "t1"
3. Double click the template item and we get a report item again.
4. We copy the item, paste to another report file.

Expected: the text item can be copied.

Actual result: Nothing happened, not copied and no error msg.

org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.command.ContentException: The Text has no explicit template parameter definition, so it can not be inserted to the slot (body) of report.
